title: Meet the mom who started the Ice Bucket Challenge
description: Remember the Ice Bucket Challenge craze this summer? Meet the mom who started it all. When Nancy Frates's son Pete hurt his wrist in a baseball game, he got an unexpected diagnosis: it wasn’t a broken bone, it was ALS, and there is no cure. In this inspiring talk, Nancy tells the story of what happened next.
author: Nancy Frates
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, disease, family, health, philanthropy
